availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Newspaper in Frankfort, Kentucky. Founded by Albert G. Hodges in 1833. Published by Hodges, Todd & Pruett. Edited by Thomas B. Stevenson from 1844 to 1846. Published by A. G. Hodges & Co. from 1846 to 1856. Edited by John W. Finnell from 1846 to 1850. Edited by William L. Callender from 1850 to 1856. Published by Albert G. Hodges from 1856 to 1864. Edited by Thomas M. Green from 1856 to 1860. Edited by J. H. Johnson from 1860 to 1863. Edited by Henri F. Middleton from 1863 to 1864. Edited by Henry E. Thomas in 1864.

bibl.p: Frank F. Mathias, "Albert Gallatin Hodges," in John E. Kleber, ed., The Kentucky Encyclopedia (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 1992), 435-6; "The Frankfort Commonwealth," Chronicling America, Accessed May 18, 2017, (http://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn82015463/); "The Daily Commonwealth," Chronicling America, Accessed May 18, 2017, (http://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn82015460/); "Tri-weekly Commonwealth," Chronicling America, Accessed May 18, 2017, (http://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn82015455/).
